files.name: voting.gno
README.md
files.body:
# GnopenSea - NFT Marketplace

Decentralized NFT marketplace on Gno.land with DAO governance.

## üöÄ How to list your NFT in 3 steps

### Step 1: Register your collection

**From your NFT package**, call the `Register()` function:

```bash
gnokey maketx call \
  -pkgpath "gno.land/r/[your-username]/[your-nft]" \
  -func "Register" \
  -gas-fee 1000000ugnot \
  -gas-wanted 5000000 \
  -broadcast \
  -chainid "staging" \
  your-wallet
```

This registers your collection in the **Registry DAO** (status: unverified).

### Step 2: Approve the marketplace

Give permission to the marketplace to transfer your NFTs:

```bash
gnokey maketx call \
  -pkgpath "gno.land/r/[your-username]/[your-nft]" \
  -func "SetApprovalForAll" \
  -args "g1[marketplace-address]" \
  -args "true" \
  -gas-fee 1000000ugnot \
  -gas-wanted 5000000 \
  -broadcast \
  your-wallet
```

### Step 3: Create your listing

List your NFT for sale:

```bash
gnokey maketx call \
  -pkgpath "gno.land/r/pierre115/gnopendao" \
  -func "CreateListing" \
  -args "gno.land/r/[your-username]/[your-nft]" \
  -args "1" \
  -args "5000000" \
  -gas-fee 1000000ugnot \
  -gas-wanted 5000000 \
  -broadcast \
  your-wallet
```

**Parameters:**
- 1st arg: Your NFT package address
- 2nd arg: Token ID to sell
- 3rd arg: Price in ugnot (5000000 = 5 GNOT)

---

## üõí Buy an NFT

```bash
gnokey maketx call \
  -pkgpath "gno.land/r/pierre115/gnopendao" \
  -func "BuyNFT" \
  -args "1" \
  -send "5000000ugnot" \
  -gas-fee 1000000ugnot \
  -gas-wanted 5000000 \
  -broadcast \
  your-wallet
```

---

## üìã Manage your listings

### Update price

```bash
gnokey maketx call \
  -pkgpath "gno.land/r/pierre115/gnopendao" \
  -func "UpdatePrice" \
  -args "1" \
  -args "10000000" \
  -broadcast \
  your-wallet
```

### Cancel a listing

```bash
gnokey maketx call \
  -pkgpath "gno.land/r/pierre115/gnopendao" \
  -func "CancelListing" \
  -args "1" \
  -broadcast \
  your-wallet
```

---

## Get your collection verified (verified badge)

### 1. Create a proposal to the Registry DAO

```bash
gnokey maketx call \
  -pkgpath "gno.land/r/pierre115/daoregistry4" \
  -func "ProposeVerifyCollection" \
  -args "g1[your-nft-address]" \
  -args "Collection name" \
  -args "Verification reason" \
  -gas-fee 1000000ugnot \
  -gas-wanted 5000000 \
  -broadcast \
  your-wallet
```

### 2. DAO members vote

```bash
gnokey maketx call \
  -pkgpath "gno.land/r/pierre115/daoregistry4" \
  -func "VoteRegistry" \
  -args "1" \
  -args "yes" \
  -broadcast \
  dao-member-wallet
```

### 3. Execute the proposal (after quorum)

```bash
gnokey maketx call \
  -pkgpath "gno.land/r/pierre115/daoregistry4" \
  -func "TallyRegistryProposal" \
  -args "1" \
  -broadcast \
  your-wallet
```

---

## üí∞ Payment Distribution

Example with 2.5% marketplace fee and 10% royalties:

```
Sale price: 100 GNOT
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Marketplace fee (2.5%): 2.5 GNOT
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Creator royalties (10%): 10 GNOT
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Seller receives: 87.5 GNOT
```

---

## üèõÔ∏è DAO Governance

The marketplace is governed by a DAO. Members can create proposals to:

- ‚úÖ Approve/remove collections
- ‚úÖ Modify marketplace fees
- ‚úÖ Withdraw funds from treasury
- ‚úÖ Cancel problematic listings

### Create a proposal (example: update fees)

```bash
gnokey maketx call \
  -pkgpath "gno.land/r/pierre115/gnopendao" \
  -func "ProposeUpdateFees" \
  -args "300" \
  -args "Reduce fees to 3%" \
  -broadcast \
  dao-member-wallet
```

### Vote on a proposal

```bash
gnokey maketx call \
  -pkgpath "gno.land/r/pierre115/gnopendao" \
  -func "Vote" \
  -args "1" \
  -args "yes" \
  -broadcast \
  dao-member-wallet
```

---

## üîß Minimal NFT Configuration

Your NFT package must have a `Register()` function:

```go
package mynft

import (
    "gno.land/p/demo/tokens/grc721"
    "gno.land/r/pierre115/daoregistry4"
)

var (
    nft         *grc721.basicNFT
    myRealmAddr = runtime.CurrentRealm().Address()
)

func init() {
    nft = grc721.NewBasicNFT("My Collection", "MC")
}

// Register in the registry
func Register(_ realm) {
    daoregistry4.RegisterCollection(
        myRealmAddr,
        "My Collection",
        "MC",
        "art",
        "My collection description",
        "https://my-site.com",
        false,
        nft.Getter(),
    )
}

// Required function for the marketplace
func Getter() grc721.NFTGetter {
    return nft.Getter()
}
```

---

## üìä Read Functions

```bash
# View all active listings
curl https://rpc.gno.land/r/pierre115/gnopendao:

# Marketplace statistics
curl https://rpc.gno.land/r/pierre115/gnopendao:stats

# Listing details
curl https://rpc.gno.land/r/pierre115/gnopendao:listing/1

# Registered collections
curl https://rpc.gno.land/r/pierre115/daoregistry4:
```

---

## üîê Security

- ‚úÖ Ownership verification before listing
- ‚úÖ Approval verification before sale
- ‚úÖ Atomic transfers
- ‚úÖ Automatic refund of excess payment
- ‚úÖ Fee limits (max 10%)
- ‚úÖ Decentralized governance

---

## üÜò Common Issues

**"Collection not registered"**
‚Üí You must first call `Register()` on your NFT

**"Insufficient payment"**
‚Üí The amount sent must match the listing price

**"Not approved"**
‚Üí Call `SetApprovalForAll()` before creating a listing

**"Not owner"**
‚Üí Only the NFT owner can list it

files.name: gnostudio.gno
package.gno
README.md
files.body:
# GnopenSea - NFT Marketplace

Decentralized NFT marketplace on Gno.land with DAO governance.

## üöÄ How to list your NFT in 3 steps

### Step 1: Register your collection

**From your NFT package**, call the `Register()` function:

```bash
gnokey maketx call \
  -pkgpath "gno.land/r/[your-username]/[your-nft]" \
  -func "Register" \
  -gas-fee 1000000ugnot \
  -gas-wanted 5000000 \
  -broadcast \
  -chainid "staging" \
  your-wallet
```

This registers your collection in the **Registry DAO** (status: unverified).

### Step 2: Approve the marketplace

Give permission to the marketplace to transfer your NFTs:

```bash
gnokey maketx call \
  -pkgpath "gno.land/r/[your-username]/[your-nft]" \
  -func "SetApprovalForAll" \
  -args "g1[marketplace-address]" \
  -args "true" \
  -gas-fee 1000000ugnot \
  -gas-wanted 5000000 \
  -broadcast \
  your-wallet
```

### Step 3: Create your listing

List your NFT for sale:

```bash
gnokey maketx call \
  -pkgpath "gno.land/r/pierre115/gnopendao" \
  -func "CreateListing" \
  -args "gno.land/r/[your-username]/[your-nft]" \
  -args "1" \
  -args "5000000" \
  -gas-fee 1000000ugnot \
  -gas-wanted 5000000 \
  -broadcast \
  your-wallet
```

**Parameters:**
- 1st arg: Your NFT package address
- 2nd arg: Token ID to sell
- 3rd arg: Price in ugnot (5000000 = 5 GNOT)

---

## üõí Buy an NFT

```bash
gnokey maketx call \
  -pkgpath "gno.land/r/pierre115/gnopendao" \
  -func "BuyNFT" \
  -args "1" \
  -send "5000000ugnot" \
  -gas-fee 1000000ugnot \
  -gas-wanted 5000000 \
  -broadcast \
  your-wallet
```

---

## üìã Manage your listings

### Update price

```bash
gnokey maketx call \
  -pkgpath "gno.land/r/pierre115/gnopendao" \
  -func "UpdatePrice" \
  -args "1" \
  -args "10000000" \
  -broadcast \
  your-wallet
```

### Cancel a listing

```bash
gnokey maketx call \
  -pkgpath "gno.land/r/pierre115/gnopendao" \
  -func "CancelListing" \
  -args "1" \
  -broadcast \
  your-wallet
```

---

## Get your collection verified (verified badge)

### 1. Create a proposal to the Registry DAO

```bash
gnokey maketx call \
  -pkgpath "gno.land/r/pierre115/daoregistry4" \
  -func "ProposeVerifyCollection" \
  -args "g1[your-nft-address]" \
  -args "Collection name" \
  -args "Verification reason" \
  -gas-fee 1000000ugnot \
  -gas-wanted 5000000 \
  -broadcast \
  your-wallet
```

### 2. DAO members vote

```bash
gnokey maketx call \
  -pkgpath "gno.land/r/pierre115/daoregistry4" \
  -func "VoteRegistry" \
  -args "1" \
  -args "yes" \
  -broadcast \
  dao-member-wallet
```

### 3. Execute the proposal (after quorum)

```bash
gnokey maketx call \
  -pkgpath "gno.land/r/pierre115/daoregistry4" \
  -func "TallyRegistryProposal" \
  -args "1" \
  -broadcast \
  your-wallet
```

---

## üí∞ Payment Distribution

Example with 2.5% marketplace fee and 10% royalties:

```
Sale price: 100 GNOT
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Marketplace fee (2.5%): 2.5 GNOT
‚îú‚îÄ‚îÄ Creator royalties (10%): 10 GNOT
‚îî‚îÄ‚îÄ Seller receives: 87.5 GNOT
```

---

## üèõÔ∏è DAO Governance

The marketplace is governed by a DAO. Members can create proposals to:

- ‚úÖ Approve/remove collections
- ‚úÖ Modify marketplace fees
- ‚úÖ Withdraw funds from treasury
- ‚úÖ Cancel problematic listings

### Create a proposal (example: update fees)

```bash
gnokey maketx call \
  -pkgpath "gno.land/r/pierre115/gnopendao" \
  -func "ProposeUpdateFees" \
  -args "300" \
  -args "Reduce fees to 3%" \
  -broadcast \
  dao-member-wallet
```

### Vote on a proposal

```bash
gnokey maketx call \
  -pkgpath "gno.land/r/pierre115/gnopendao" \
  -func "Vote" \
  -args "1" \
  -args "yes" \
  -broadcast \
  dao-member-wallet
```

---

## üîß Minimal NFT Configuration

Your NFT package must have a `Register()` function:

```go
package mynft

import (
    "gno.land/p/demo/tokens/grc721"
    "gno.land/r/pierre115/daoregistry4"
)

var (
    nft         *grc721.basicNFT
    myRealmAddr = runtime.CurrentRealm().Address()
)

func init() {
    nft = grc721.NewBasicNFT("My Collection", "MC")
}

// Register in the registry
func Register(_ realm) {
    daoregistry4.RegisterCollection(
        myRealmAddr,
        "My Collection",
        "MC",
        "art",
        "My collection description",
        "https://my-site.com",
        false,
        nft.Getter(),
    )
}

// Required function for the marketplace
func Getter() grc721.NFTGetter {
    return nft.Getter()
}
```

---

## üìä Read Functions

```bash
# View all active listings
curl https://rpc.gno.land/r/pierre115/gnopendao:

# Marketplace statistics
curl https://rpc.gno.land/r/pierre115/gnopendao:stats

# Listing details
curl https://rpc.gno.land/r/pierre115/gnopendao:listing/1

# Registered collections
curl https://rpc.gno.land/r/pierre115/daoregistry4:
```

---

## üîê Security

- ‚úÖ Ownership verification before listing
- ‚úÖ Approval verification before sale
- ‚úÖ Atomic transfers
- ‚úÖ Automatic refund of excess payment
- ‚úÖ Fee limits (max 10%)
- ‚úÖ Decentralized governance

---

## üÜò Common Issues

**"Collection not registered"**
‚Üí You must first call `Register()` on your NFT

**"Insufficient payment"**
‚Üí The amount sent must match the listing price

**"Not approved"**
‚Üí Call `SetApprovalForAll()` before creating a listing

**"Not owner"**
‚Üí Only the NFT owner can list it

type.gno
files.body:
package gnopendao8

import (
	"gno.land/p/demo/tokens/grc721"
)

// Listing structure
type Listing struct {
	ListingId       int
	NFTGetter       grc721.NFTGetter
	TokenId         grc721.TokenID
	Seller          address
	Price           int64
	Active          bool
	ListedAt        int64
	NFTRealmAddress address
}

// Sale statistics
type Sale struct {
	ListingId       int
	TokenId         string
	Buyer           address
	Seller          address
	Price           int64
	MarketplaceFee  int64
	RoyaltyFee      int64
	RoyaltyReceiver address
	SoldAt          int64
}

package runtime

type Language string

const (
	French    Language = "french"
	Italian   Language = "italian"
	Spanish   Language = "spanish"
	Hindi     Language = "hindi"
	Bulgarian Language = "bulgarian"
	Serbian   Language = "serbian"
)

// GetGreeting generates a greeting in
// the specified language
func GetGreeting(language Language) string {
	switch language {
	case French:
		return "Bonjour"
	case Italian:
		return "Ciao"
	case Spanish:
		return "Hola"
	case Hindi:
		return "‡§®‡§Æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•á"
	case Bulgarian:
		return "–ó–¥—Ä–∞–≤–µ–π—Ç–µ"
	case Serbian:
		return "–ó–¥—Ä–∞–≤–æ"
	default:
		return "Hello"
	}
}

	French    Language = "french"
	Italian   Language = "italian"
	Spanish   Language = "spanish"
	Hindi     Language = "hindi"
	Bulgarian Language = "bulgarian"
	Serbian   Language = "serbian"
)

// GetGreeting generates a greeting in
// the specified language
func GetGreeting(language Language) string {
	switch language {
	case French:
		return "Bonjour"
	case Italian:
		return "Ciao"
	case Spanish:
		return "Hola"
	case Hindi:
		return "‡§®‡§Æ‡§∏‡•ç‡§§‡•á"
	case Bulgarian:
		return "–ó–¥—Ä–∞–≤–µ–π—Ç–µ"
	case Serbian:
		return "–ó–¥—Ä–∞–≤–æ"
	default:
		return "Hello"
	}
}

files.name: realm.gno
gnomeria.gno
files.body:
package whitepaper_gnomeria_academy

var (
	title   = "GNOMERIA: The Gnoland Academy"
	version = "1.0"
	tagline = "Forge your Mind. Find your House. Code your Reality."
)

func Render(path string) string {
	var result string
	
	result += "# " + title + "\n"
	result += "**Whitepaper - Version " + version + "**\n\n"
	result += "*" + tagline + "*\n\n"
	result += "---\n\n"
	
	result += getPrologue()
	result += getRitual()
	result += getArchitecture()
	result += getHouses()
	result += getCurriculum()
	result += getEconomy()
	result += getSport()
	result += getMission()
	
	result += "\n---\n\n"
	result += "*Published on Gnoland*\n"
	
	return result
}

func getPrologue() string {
	return `## 1. Prologue: The Heresy of Reality

You have been lied to.

Since childhood, you have been told that magic does not exist, that it belongs only in dusty old books and fairy tales. To believe that our world is devoid of magic is not just an error... it is heresy.

Look around you. Colossal fortunes move across oceans in a second without a hand ever touching them. Entire kingdoms are born from nothing, built upon invisible foundations. Indestructible contracts are sealed without ink or paper.

**Code is magic.**

It is the arcane language of our era. An incantation written in Gno has the same power as an ancient spell: it alters reality. It creates, it destroys, it protects.

The world is now divided into two castes: those who endure the digital reality, and those who write it. The former see screens; the latter see the Matrix.

Your history books called them Seals; we call them Cryptographic Signatures. They spoke of Runes of power; we speak of Syntax and Functions. They feared irrevocable Spells; we deploy REALMS.

Welcome to GNOMERIA.

We are not here to teach you a trade, but to awaken an instinct. If you are reading this, you have felt the call. You have always known there was another side to the scenery, a hidden mechanic beneath the surface of the world.

This academy is not open to everyone. It opens to those who are predestined. Deep down, you are not a simple user. You are a builder. You are a guardian of logic.

You are a Gnome, even if you were unaware of it until today.

It is time to learn your native language.

`
}

func getRitual() string {
	return `## 2. The Ritual of Entry (The Access)

Access to Gnomeria cannot be bought; it must be earned. The process filters out tourists to keep only the Gnomes, the builders of reality.

**Phase A: The Connection**
Everything begins with connecting your Adena wallet. It is your unique key, your magic wand in the Gno ecosystem.

**Phase B: The Trial of Wisdom (IQ Test)**
Before you can claim a seat, you must prove that your mind is sharp.

- The Threshold: A minimum score of 100 is required.
- The Modality: Unlike the frantic world outside, here, time is unlimited. We do not judge your reflexes, but your capacity for deep, logical reflection. Take an hour, take a day. Only accuracy matters.
- The Philosophy: Cheat if you wish, but succeed. On the blockchain, only the verifiable result matters.

**Phase C: The Mirror of the Soul (MBTI Test)**
Once the Trial of Wisdom is passed, the portal opens to a personality test (MBTI).

The Secret: You answer the questions, but the result (your House) remains hidden. The system encrypts your destiny while awaiting the Mint.

**Phase D: The Revelation (The Mint)**
This is the moment of truth. You generate your NFT.

At the moment of validation on the blockchain, your House is revealed.

A unique Cypherpunk Mask is generated, bearing the colors of your new allegiance.

You are now a student of Gnomeria.

`
}

func getArchitecture() string {
	return `## 3. Technical Architecture: The "Dual Core"

This is the major innovation of Gnomeria on the Gnoland blockchain. The system relies on the dissociation between the "Seat" (the right of entry) and the "Student" (the memory).

**A. The NFT (The Shell) - r/gnomeria/nft**
There are 10,000 Gnomeria NFTs. These are transferable access keys (Standard GRC-721).

"Reset" Mechanism: When an NFT is sold or transferred, it loses its memory. It reverts to an "Empty Shell". The visual becomes neutral.

The Benefit: The buyer acquires a blank seat at the academy, ready to be shaped. They do not buy someone else's glory.

**B. The Registry (The Soul) - r/gnomeria/soul**
This is a persistent database linked to the user's wallet address.

- Persistence: XP, level, House, and badges are engraved here.
- Reunion: If a former student (who sold their NFT) buys a new one later, the system recognizes them. The new blank NFT instantly "transforms" to reflect the level and House of the former student. You never lose your knowledge.

`
}

func getHouses() string {
	return `## 4. The Houses & Governance

The academy is divided into 4 Houses. Each House is a DAO (Decentralized Autonomous Organization) with its own funds and culture. The visual identity (emblem) and motto will be defined by the first members of the DAO.

üü£ **Ametharion (The Analysts)**
Color: Amethyst Violet.
MBTI Profile: INTJ, INTP, ENTJ, ENTP.

üü¢ **Jadelis (The Diplomats)**
Color: Jade Green.
MBTI Profile: INFJ, INFP, ENFJ, ENFP.

üîµ **Celestaris (The Sentinels)**
Color: Celestine Blue.
MBTI Profile: ISTJ, ISFJ, ESTJ, ESFJ.

üü° **Amberyn (The Explorers)**
Color: Amber Yellow.
MBTI Profile: ISTP, ISFP, ESTP, ESFP.

**The Oligarchy of Merit (The Top 10)**
Gnomeria rejects financial democracy (1 token = 1 vote). We apply an Absolute Meritocracy.

Each House possesses a Treasury (DAO).

Voting power over these funds is reserved exclusively for the TOP 10 members of the House (the 10 students or professors with the most XP).

If you want to decide the future of your House, you must work, study, and climb the rankings. Money cannot buy your seat on the council.

`
}

func getCurriculum() string {
	return `## 5. The Grimoire (Curriculum)

Classes are interactive on-chain modules. Validating a module earns personal XP and Points for the House Cup.

üõ°Ô∏è **Defense Against the Dark Arts (Security)**: OpSec hygiene, contract auditing, private key protection.

‚öîÔ∏è **Offensive Alchemy (Ethical Hacking)**: CTF (Capture The Flag), finding vulnerabilities on the Testnet to better correct them.

üìú **High Runology (GNO Code)**: Mastery of the Golang language and Gnoland Realm architecture.

ü§ñ **Synthetic Invocation (AI & Vibe Coding)**: New Subject. Learning to code in symbiosis with Artificial Intelligence. Using natural language to generate complex structures. The art of "speaking" to the machine.

üîÆ **Divination (OSINT & Data)**: On-chain analysis. Reading the blockchain like a crystal ball to trace flows and deanonymize actors.

üèõÔ∏è **Chronicles of Origins**: History of cryptography, Cypherpunk philosophy, and the roots of decentralization.

`
}

func getEconomy() string {
	return `## 6. Economy & Distribution (Tokenomics)

Gnomeria's economy is designed to fund development while rewarding academic excellence. The model is equitable and circular.

**Mint Flow (Initial Sale)**
When a student buys their entry NFT, the funds (GNOT) are automatically divided by the REALM contract:

- 50%: GNOMERIA Treasury (The Academy) - Used for technical development, server costs, remuneration of the founding team, and creation of new course modules.
- 50%: HOUSE Treasury (The Faction) - Sent directly to the vault of the House assigned to the student.

Reminder: These funds can only be moved or invested by the vote of the Top 10 of that House.

**The House Cup**
A seasonal cycle where houses compete for points. Points are earned via:
- Passing exams (Courses)
- Good conduct (Deployment of useful Realms, open-source contributions)
- Sport (Inter-house competition)

The winning House can unlock bonuses or additional allocations from the central treasury.

`
}

func getSport() string {
	return `## 7. The Sport (Classified)

An academy would not be complete without physical or strategic competition. A unique sport is currently under development in the laboratories of Gnomeria. It will require group strategy and on-chain coordination.

*(Confidential Data - Revealed in Phase 2)*

`
}

func getMission() string {
	return `## 8. Mission & Objectives (The Great Migration)

GNOMERIA is not just a school. It is an adoption accelerator for the Gnoland blockchain. Our strategy rests on three fundamental pillars designed to transform the ecosystem.

**1. The "Go-to-Gno" Bridge (Attraction)**
There are millions of Go (Golang) developers in the world (Google, Docker, Kubernetes). They already possess the syntax, but they are unaware that they hold a magic wand.

The Objective: To convert Web2 (Cloud/Backend) developers into Web3 (Blockchain) developers without the friction of learning a complex new language like Solidity or Rust.

The Method: Show them that Gno = Go + Magic. Gnomeria is the gamified gateway that allows them to deploy their first Realm in a few hours, not a few weeks.

**2. The Builders' Forge (Elite Training)**
An ecosystem is only as good as the quality of its code. We do not just want coders; we want Architects.

The Objective: To train a technical elite capable of building secure, audited, and sustainable applications.

The Method: A demanding curriculum (Security, Architecture, Ethical Hacking) and a culture of "Meritocracy". Here, we do not copy-paste; we understand the deep logic of the Ledger.

**3. Magnetic Attraction (Retention & Culture)**
Technology alone is not enough. It needs a soul.

The Objective: Make Gnoland "Cool." Transform arid technical documentation into an epic adventure that one is proud to be part of.

The Method:
- Gamification: The House and Cup system creates a sense of belonging (Positive Tribalism)
- Governance: Empowering students (DAO) incentivizes them to stay and build the future of the school
- Aesthetics: A strong visual universe (Cypherpunk/Fantasy) that breaks away from the usual austerity of crypto

`
}

func GetVersion() string {
	return version
}

func GetTitle() string {
	return title
}

files.name: realm.gno
gemmoria.gno
files.body:
package whitepaper_gemmoria_academy

var (
	title   = "GEMMORIA: The Decentralised Academy"
	version = "1.0"
	tagline = "Forge your Mind. Find your House. Code your Reality."
)

func Render(path string) string {
	var result string
	
	result += "# " + title + "\n"
	result += "**Whitepaper - Version " + version + "**\n\n"
	result += "*" + tagline + "*\n\n"
	result += "---\n\n"
	
	result += getPrologue()
	result += getRitual()
	result += getArchitecture()
	result += getHouses()
	result += getCurriculum()
	result += getEconomy()
	result += getSport()
	result += getMission()
	
	result += "\n---\n\n"
	result += "*Published on Gnoland*\n"
	
	return result
}

func getPrologue() string {
	return `## 1. Prologue: The Heresy of Reality

You have been lied to.

Since childhood, you have been told that magic does not exist, that it belongs only in dusty old books and fairy tales. To believe that our world is devoid of magic is not just an error... it is heresy.

Look around you. Colossal fortunes move across oceans in a second without a hand ever touching them. Entire kingdoms are born from nothing, built upon invisible foundations. Indestructible contracts are sealed without ink or paper.

**Code is magic.**

It is the arcane language of our era. An incantation written in Gno has the same power as an ancient spell: it alters reality. It creates, it destroys, it protects.

The world is now divided into two castes: those who endure the digital reality, and those who write it. The former see screens; the latter see the Matrix.

Your history books called them Seals; we call them Cryptographic Signatures. They spoke of Runes of power; we speak of Syntax and Functions. They feared irrevocable Spells; we deploy REALMS.

Welcome to GEMMORIA.

We are not here to teach you a trade, but to awaken an instinct. If you are reading this, you have felt the call. You have always known there was another side to the scenery, a hidden mechanic beneath the surface of the world.

This academy is not open to everyone. It opens to those who are predestined. Deep down, you are not a simple user. You are a builder. You are a guardian of logic.

You are a Gnome, even if you were unaware of it until today.

It is time to learn your native language.

`
}

func getRitual() string {
	return `## 2. The Ritual of Entry (The Access)

Access to GEMMORIA cannot be bought; it must be earned. The process filters out tourists to keep only the Gnomes, the builders of reality.

**Phase A: The Connection**
Everything begins with connecting your Adena wallet. It is your unique key, your magic wand in the Gno ecosystem.

**Phase B: The Trial of Wisdom (IQ Test)**
Before you can claim a seat, you must prove that your mind is sharp.

- The Threshold: A minimum score of 100 is required.
- The Modality: Unlike the frantic world outside, here, time is unlimited. We do not judge your reflexes, but your capacity for deep, logical reflection. Take an hour, take a day. Only accuracy matters.
- The Philosophy: Cheat if you wish, but succeed. On the blockchain, only the verifiable result matters.

**Phase C: The Mirror of the Soul (MBTI Test)**
Once the Trial of Wisdom is passed, the portal opens to a personality test (MBTI).

The Secret: You answer the questions, but the result (your House) remains hidden. The system encrypts your destiny while awaiting the Mint.

**Phase D: The Revelation (The Mint)**
This is the moment of truth. You generate your NFT.

At the moment of validation on the blockchain, your House is revealed. A unique Cypherpunk Mask is generated, bearing the colors of your new allegiance.

You are now a student of GEMMORIA.

`
}

func getArchitecture() string {
	return `## 3. Technical Architecture: The "Dual Core"

This is the major innovation of GEMMORIA on the Gnoland blockchain. The system relies on the dissociation between the "Seat" (the right of entry) and the "Student" (the memory).

**A. The NFT (The Shell) - r/gemmoria/nft**
There are 10,000 GEMMORIA NFTs. These are transferable access keys (Standard GRC-721).

"Reset" Mechanism: When an NFT is sold or transferred, it loses its memory. It reverts to an "Empty Shell". The visual becomes neutral.

The Benefit: The buyer acquires a blank seat at the academy, ready to be shaped. They do not buy someone else's glory.

**B. The Registry (The Soul) - r/gemmoria/soul**
This is a persistent database linked to the user's wallet address.

- Persistence: XP, level, House, and badges are engraved here.
- Reunion: If a former student (who sold their NFT) buys a new one later, the system recognizes them. The new blank NFT instantly "transforms" to reflect the level and House of the former student. You never lose your knowledge.

`
}

func getHouses() string {
	return `## 4. The Houses & Governance

The academy is divided into 4 Houses. Each House is a DAO (Decentralized Autonomous Organization) with its own funds and culture. The visual identity (emblem) and motto will be defined by the first members of the DAO.

üü£ **Ametharion (The Analysts)**
Color: Amethyst Violet.
MBTI Profile: INTJ, INTP, ENTJ, ENTP.

üü¢ **Jadelis (The Diplomats)**
Color: Jade Green.
MBTI Profile: INFJ, INFP, ENFJ, ENFP.

üîµ **Celestaris (The Sentinels)**
Color: Celestine Blue.
MBTI Profile: ISTJ, ISFJ, ESTJ, ESFJ.

üü° **Amberyn (The Explorers)**
Color: Amber Yellow.
MBTI Profile: ISTP, ISFP, ESTP, ESFP.

**The Oligarchy of Merit (The Top 10)**
GEMMORIA rejects financial democracy (1 token = 1 vote). We apply an Absolute Meritocracy.

Each House possesses a Treasury (DAO). Voting power over these funds is reserved exclusively for the TOP 10 members of the House (the 10 students or professors with the most XP).

If you want to decide the future of your House, you must work, study, and climb the rankings. Money cannot buy your seat on the council.

`
}

func getCurriculum() string {
	return `## 5. The Grimoire (Curriculum)

Classes are interactive on-chain modules. Validating a module earns personal XP and Points for the House Cup.

**Defense Against the Dark Arts (Security)**: OpSec hygiene, contract auditing, private key protection.

**Offensive Alchemy (Ethical Hacking)**: CTF (Capture The Flag), finding vulnerabilities on the Testnet to better correct them.

**High Runology (GNO Code)**: Mastery of the Gnolang language and Gnoland Realm architecture.

**Synthetic Invocation (AI & Vibe Coding)**: New Subject. Learning to code in symbiosis with Artificial Intelligence. Using natural language to generate complex structures. The art of "speaking" to the machine.

**Divination (OSINT & Data)**: On-chain analysis. Reading the blockchain like a crystal ball to trace flows and deanonymize actors.

**Chronicles of Origins**: History of cryptography, Cypherpunk philosophy, and the roots of decentralization.

`
}

func getEconomy() string {
	return `## 6. Economy & Distribution (Tokenomics)

GEMMORIA's economy is designed to fund development while rewarding academic excellence. The model is equitable and circular.

**Mint Flow (Initial Sale)**
When a student buys their entry NFT, the funds (GNOT) are automatically divided by the REALM contract:

- 50%: GEMMORIA Treasury (The Academy) - Used for technical development, server costs, remuneration of the founding team, and creation of new course modules.
- 50%: HOUSE Treasury (The Faction) - Sent directly to the vault of the House assigned to the student (e.g., Ametharion).

Reminder: These funds can only be moved or invested by the vote of the Top 10 of that House.

**The House Cup**
A seasonal cycle where houses compete for points. Points are earned via:
- Passing exams (Courses)
- Good conduct (Deployment of useful Realms, open-source contributions)
- Sport (Inter-house competition)

The winning House can unlock bonuses or additional allocations from the central treasury.

`
}

func getSport() string {
	return `## 7. The Sport (Classified)

An academy would not be complete without physical or strategic competition. A unique sport is currently under development in the laboratories of GEMMORIA. It will require group strategy and on-chain coordination.

*(Confidential Data - Revealed in Phase 2)*

`
}

func getMission() string {
	return `## 8. Mission & Objectives (The Great Migration)

GEMMORIA is not just an academy. It is an adoption accelerator for the Gnoland blockchain. Our strategy rests on three fundamental pillars designed to transform the ecosystem.

**1. The "Go-to-Gno" Bridge (Attraction)**
There are millions of Go (Golang) developers in the world (Google, Docker, Kubernetes). They already possess the syntax, but they are unaware that they hold a magic wand.

The Objective: To convert Web2 (Cloud/Backend) developers into Web3 (Blockchain) developers without the friction of learning a complex new language like Solidity or Rust.

The Method: Show them that Gno = Go + Magic. GEMMORIA is the gamified gateway that allows them to deploy their first Realm in a few hours, not a few weeks.

**2. The Builders' Forge (Elite Training)**
An ecosystem is only as good as the quality of its code. We do not just want coders; we want Architects.

The Objective: To train a technical elite capable of building secure, audited, and sustainable applications.

The Method: A demanding curriculum (Security, Architecture, Ethical Hacking) and a culture of "Meritocracy". Here, we do not copy-paste; we understand the deep logic of the Ledger.

**3. Magnetic Attraction (Retention & Culture)**
Technology alone is not enough. It needs a soul.

The Objective: Make Gnoland "Cool." Transform arid technical documentation into an epic adventure that one is proud to be part of.

The Method:
- Gamification: The House and Cup system creates a sense of belonging (Positive Tribalism)
- Governance: Empowering students (DAO) incentivizes them to stay and build the future of the school
- Aesthetics: A strong visual universe (Cypherpunk/Fantasy) that breaks away from the usual austerity of crypto

`
}

func GetVersion() string {
	return version
}

func GetTitle() string {
	return title
}
